body.name: Handheld Steamer for Clothes-1500Watts 15s Fast Heat-up Ceramic Plate Steam Nozzle, Portable Handheld Garment 2 in 1 Fabric Wrinkles, Remover and Clothing Iron,For Home and Office,Hotel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 3 mins
features: 💨👕[Easy operation] OJA clothes steamer preheats in just 15s for quick wrinkle removal. The lock switch allows for continuous steaming and an LCD screen making it simple for you to operate.

💨👕[Powerful wrinkle removal in 3 seconds] This handheld steamer's powerful 300Kpa penetration delivers 25g/min of powerful steam, bursting 1.2m of strong steam to penetrate deep into fabrics and loosen even the toughest wrinkles, from delicate silks to sturdy denim. Plus, its compact size makes it easy to store and carry on the go.

💨👕[1500W Strong steam garment steamer] The steamer iron for clothes has powerful steam. The first level is gentle for delicate fabrics such as silk, chiffon and wool, while the second level is strong for heavy garments such as cotton, linen and nylon. The ceramic plate of handheld steamer will reach a high temperature of 230°F and you can use the portable steamer for dry ironing directly once the water is depleted.

💨👕[Innovative 360° anti-spill design ] Portable steamer with 360 ° innovative leak-proof design has a unique steam distribution system to evenly distribute steam on the fabric, its anti-drip technology whether lying horizontally or hanging vertically at any angle can prevent water from dripping onto your clothes without worrying about dripping or leaving unsightly stains.

💨👕[Easy to hold, long ironing not tired] Our steamer is one of the more portable and comfortable on the market, with an easy-to-grip design and comfortable handle, its lightweight construction makes it easy to maneuver and control and easily ironing 15 garments without causing hand fatigue.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Portable powerful handheld steamer gives you that fabulous steam experience you crave, efficient use on a wide range of fabrics.

Detachable Water Tank 255ml capacity allows for 15+ minutes of continuous steaming. One-button Switch 2 Steam levels or Dry Ironing - all can be controlled by the one-button switch. Steam Button Locking front button for continuous misting for comfortable ironing Nozzle Brush Accessory Comes with an attachable fabric brush that helps steam thick garments like coats and jackets.
Powerful Garment Steamer Powerful enough to remove wrinkles and stains from even the most stubborn clothes

Easy to hold without tiring hands Clothing steamer mode has 2 steam outputs to take the wrinkles off a heavy fabric. Comfortable handle design This steamer 360° portability provides a steaming no matter the angle you use it.
The portable steamer is ideal for use at home or when traveling and can easily fit into your suitcase or overnight bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super clear, tall and elegant Italian handblown champagne glassware
reviews.reviewText: In the last 6 months I have really invested time in comparing glassware. Performing taste test with my favorite champagnes, whether Brut and vintages alike. I noticed a huge difference in flavor and taste when comparing thinner to thicker glassware. If the lip of the glass is too thick, or if the glass is too thick, you truly miss the taste and the flavors a beautiful champagne can possess. The gorgeous Italian handblown, thin and super clear glass is the not only GORGEOUS, tall and elegant, but you capture all the flavors of any champagne, especially your high end champagne. The glass is so thin, nothing will come between you and your champagne! As thin as it is, it feel durable too. The base of the glass is very sturdy. This glassware is great for hosting parties, wedding venues or just a romantic sip of champagne at home. I purchased 20 glasses and have shared this brand with all my friends. The price point for the flute is a steal! You will not find this quality of handblown glassware for the price point sold today. Similar quality of super clear champagne glasses, with other brands, are much higher in price and do not compare to the beautiful Italian Handblown flute. Purchase a pair, and you will see you will come back for more!♥️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful delicate glasses
reviews.reviewText: These glasses were exactly what I was looking for to have champagne for special occasions (although in Corona times I call Friday a special occasion). They are very delicate, tall, and look beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE these glasses. They came packaged safely so when i dropped the package i was worried i was going to find broken glass inside, but NOPE they were perfectly fine. They are tall, and the glass is very clear. They are going to look great together!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2020
reviews.reviewText: These glasses are wafer thin and delicate. They are very pleasant to sip sparkling from, and the do show off nice streams of fine bubbles. But are very thin and feel as if they will break at the slightest mishandling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2020
Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more ironing!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have always wanted a handheld steamer for as long as I can remember. Previously I had to deal with steamers that were either being too heavy, too small, or scorched my clothing. Into the donation pile they went.As I unpacked the AOOE Handheld Steamer, I was very happy because it looked so cool. But looks aren’t what makes a great steamer. The steamer definitely feels sturdy, the weight is well balanced, and once I read the instructions (very helpful), my steamer was ready to work. I turned the steamer on and it was ready in 15 seconds. I selected the appropriate steam distribution (high or low), and I was set to go. So easy to use. I am completely satisfied!I definitely am able to bring my steamer with me when I travel, but it is just a little bit on the large size for short trips. It sure beats the heck out of ironing any day.Since we live in an arid climate, we have hard water, so it is important to use distilled water for the longevity of the steamer.
